title: Editorial: Are self-service kiosks for lottery tickets a good idea?
text:
Published By: Des Moines Register - Today 
Proposed new machines shouldn't be used to simply expand the number of lottery retailers or boost ticket sales. ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
